com.engiweb.profilemanager.common.ruleengine.action.reorganize

Class _OrgUnitAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.engiweb.profilemanager.common.ruleengine.action.reorganize._OrgUnitAction

  • public class _OrgUnitAction
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to manage 'Organizational Unit' entities through Drools rules engine

      • find

        public static <any> find(DAO sql,
                         OrgUnitBean ouStartBean,
                         OrgUnitBean orgUnit,
                         Paging paging)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the organization units according to the filter given. It is possible to pass an organization unit from which to start the hierarchical search. If no organization unit is provided, the search starts from the root organization unit.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        ouStartBean - starting organization unit filter
        orgUnit - organization unit filter
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of organization units found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findChildren

        public static <any> findChildren(DAO sql,
                                 OrgUnitBean ouParentBean)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the organization units that are children of the parent organization unit given.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        ouParentBean - parent organization unit from which to start the search, if null it starts from the root organization unit
        Returns:
        list of organization units found in the hierarchy
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findChildren

        public static <any> findChildren(DAO sql,
                                 boolean showAdmin,
                                 OrgUnitBean ouParentBean)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the organization units that are children of the parent organization unit given. The showAdmin boolean flag allows to also search for the administrators of each organization unit found. These information are maintained into the OrgUnitBeans returned.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        showAdmin - boolean flag used to specify if search, for each organization unit found, the administrators or not
        ouParentBean - parent organization unit from which to start the search, if null it starts from the root organization unit
        Returns:
        list of organization units found in the hierarchy
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findParent

        public static <any> findParent(DAO sql,
                               boolean showAdmin,
                               OrgUnitBean orgUnit)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the organization units that are parent of the organization unit given. The showAdmin boolean flag allows to also search for the administrators of each organization unit found. These information are maintained into the OrgUnitBeans returned.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        showAdmin - boolean flag used to specify if search, for each organization unit found, the administrators or not
        orgUnit - organization unit from which to start the search, if null it returns the root organization unit
        Returns:
        list of organization units found in the hierarchy
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findEntitlementByOU

        public static <any> findEntitlementByOU(DAO sql,
                                        boolean hierarchy,
                                        EntitlementBean entitlementBean,
                                        ApplicationBean applicationBean,
                                        OrgUnitBean orgUnit,
                                        Paging paging)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the entitlements assigned to the organization unit given. The hierarchy boolean flag is used to extend the search to the children of the organization unit given. It is possible to filter by entitlement and application.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        hierarchy - boolean flag to extend the search to the children of the organization unit given
        entitlementBean - entitlement filter
        applicationBean - application filter
        orgUnit - organization unit filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of entitlements of the organization unit
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findUsersByOU

        public static <any> findUsersByOU(DAO sql,
                                  OrgUnitBean orgUnit,
                                  Paging paging)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the users belonging to the single organization unit given. If the orgUnit parameter is null, the method returns the users that aren't associated to any organizational unit. If the organization unit given is not found then it is used the root organization unit.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        orgUnit - organization unit filter, if null returns the users not associated to any organization unit
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of users found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findUser

        public static <any> findUser(DAO sql,
                             boolean hierarchy,
                             UserBean userBean,
                             OrgUnitBean orgUnit,
                             Paging paging)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the users belonging to the organization unit given. It is possible to filter by user. The hierarchy boolean flag is used to specify if the search must also include the children of the organization unit given or not. If the orgUnit parameter is null, the method returns the users that aren't associated to any organizational unit. If the organization unit given is not found then it is used the root organization unit.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        hierarchy - boolean flag used to specify if the search must also include the children of the organization unit given or not.
        userBean - user filter
        orgUnit - organization unit filter, if null returns the users not associated to any organization unit
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of users found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findUser

        public static <any> findUser(DAO sql,
                             boolean hierarchy,
                             UserBean userBean,
                             EntitlementBean entitlementBean,
                             OrgUnitBean orgUnit,
                             Paging paging)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the users belonging to the organization unit given. It is possible to filter by user and entitlement. The hierarchy boolean flag is used to specify if the search must also include the children of the organization unit given or not. If the orgUnit parameter is null, the method returns the users that aren't associated to any organizational unit. If the organization unit given is not found then it is used the root organization unit.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        hierarchy - boolean flag used to specify if the search must also include the children of the organization unit given or not.
        userBean - user filter
        entitlementBean - entitlement filter
        orgUnit - organization unit filter, if null returns the users not associated to any organization unit
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of users found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • addOrgUnit

        public static OrgUnitBean addOrgUnit(DAO sql,
                                     boolean inheritEntitlements,
                                     boolean inheritResources,
                                     OrgUnitBean parentBean,
                                     OrgUnitBean orgUnit)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        The method provides the insertion of the organization unit given into the hierarchy of organization units. It is possible to specify the parent organization unit under which to place the new organization unit and, enabling the corresponding boolean flag, it is possible to inherit the entitlements and/or the resources of the parent organization unit. If no parent organization unit is provided, the new organization unit is placed under the root of the hierarchy.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        inheritEntitlements - boolean flag used to specify if the inserted organizational unit must inherit the entitlements of the parent organization unit or not
        inheritResources - boolean flag used to specify if the inserted organizational unit must inherit the resources of the parent organization unit or not
        parentBean - parent organization unit
        orgUnit - organization unit to insert, mandatory
        Returns:
        organization unit inserted
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • addOrgUnit

        public static OrgUnitBean addOrgUnit(DAO sql,
                                     boolean inheritEntitlements,
                                     boolean inheritResources,
                                     OrgUnitBean parent,
                                     java.lang.String code,
                                     java.lang.String name,
                                     java.lang.String description)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        The method provides the insertion of the organization unit, identified by the code and name given, into the hierarchy of organization units. It is possible to specify the parent organization unit under which to place the new organization unit and, enabling the corresponding boolean flag, it is possible to inherit the entitlements and/or the resources of the parent organization unit. If no parent organization unit is provided, the new organization unit is placed under the root of the hierarchy.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        inheritEntitlements - boolean flag used to specify if the inserted organizational unit must to inherit the entitlements of the parent organization unit or not
        inheritResources - boolean flag used to specify if the inserted organizational unit must to inherit the resources of the parent organization unit or not
        parent - parent organization unit
        code - organization unit code, mandatory
        name - organization unit name, mandatory
        description - organization unit description
        Returns:
        organization unit inserted
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findResource

        public static <any> findResource(DAO sql,
                                 ResourceBean resourceBean,
                                 OrgUnitBean orgUnit,
                                 Paging paging)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the resources assigned to the organization unit given. It is possible to filter by resource.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        resourceBean - resource filter
        orgUnit - organization unit filter, mandatory
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of resources assigned to the organization unit given
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • addResources

        public static void addResources(DAO sql,
                                boolean hierarchy,
                                boolean resourcesInheritable,
                                <any> resources,
                                OrgUnitBean orgUnit)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        The method adds a given list of resources to the organization unit given. The hierarchy boolean flag is used to specify if the assignment must also include the children of the organization unit given or not. The resourcesInheritable boolean flag is used to specify if the resources assigned must to be inheritable by the users belonging to the target organization unit or not.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        hierarchy - boolean flag used to specify if the assignment must also include the children of the organization unit given or not
        resourcesInheritable - boolean flag used to specify if the resources assigned must to be inheritable by the users belonging to the organization unit or not
        resources - list of resources to add to the organization unit
        orgUnit - organization unit target of the assignment of resources, mandatory
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • addEntitlements

        public static void addEntitlements(DAO sql,
                                   boolean hierarchy,
                                   <any> entitlements,
                                   OrgUnitBean orgUnit)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        The method adds a given list of entitlements to the organization unit given. The hierarchy boolean flag is used to specify if the assignment must also include the children of the organization unit given or not.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        hierarchy - boolean flag used to specify if the assignment must also include the children of the organization unit given or not
        entitlements - list of entitlements to add to the organization unit
        orgUnit - organization unit target of the assignment of entitlements, mandatory
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • addEntitlements

        public static void addEntitlements(DAO sql,
                                   boolean hierarchy,
                                   boolean alignUserToDefault,
                                   <any> entitlements,
                                   OrgUnitBean orgUnit)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        The method adds a given list of entitlements to the organization unit given. The hierarchy boolean flag is used to specify if the assignment must also include the children of the organization unit given or not. The alignUserToDefault boolean flag is used to specify if the "default" entitlements assigned to the organization unit must be also assigned to the users belonging to it.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        hierarchy - boolean flag used to specify if the assignment must also include the children of the organization unit given or not
        alignUserToDefault - boolean flag used to specify if the "default" entitlements assigned to the organization unit must be also assigned to the users belonging to it.
        entitlements - list of entitlements to add to the organization unit
        orgUnit - organization unit target of the assignment of entitlements, mandatory
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • modifyEntitlements

        public static void modifyEntitlements(DAO sql,
                                      boolean hierarchy,
                                      boolean alignUserToDefault,
                                      <any> entitlements,
                                      OrgUnitBean orgUnit)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        The method modifies a given list of entitlements of the organization unit given. The hierarchy boolean flag is used to specify if the modification must also include the children of the organization unit given or not. The alignUserToDefault boolean flag is used to specify if the "default" entitlements modified of the organization unit must be also assigned to the users belonging to it.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        hierarchy - boolean flag used to specify if the modification must also include the children of the organization unit given or not
        alignUserToDefault - boolean flag used to specify if the "default" entitlements modified of the organization unit must be also assigned to the users belonging to it.
        entitlements - list of entitlements to add to the organization unit
        orgUnit - organization unit target of the modification of entitlements, mandatory
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • deleteOrgUnit

        public static void deleteOrgUnit(DAO sql,
                                 boolean hierarchy,
                                 OrgUnitBean orgUnit)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        The method deletes the organization unit given. The hierarchy boolean flag is used to specify if the deletion must also include the children of the organization unit given or not. If false the organization unit is deleted and its hierarchy of children is shifted up and attached to its parent.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        hierarchy - boolean flag used to specify if the deletion must also include the children of the organization unit given or not
        orgUnit - organization unit to delete, mandatory
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • updateOrgUnit

        public static void updateOrgUnit(DAO sql,
                                 OrgUnitBean newOuParentBean,
                                 OrgUnitBean ouBean)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        The method updates the organization unit given. If it is provided a parent organization unit different by that already assigned, the organization unit given and its hierarchy of children are moved under the new parent organization unit.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        newOuParentBean - new parent organization unit under which to place the organization unit and its hierarchy of children
        ouBean - organization unit to update, mandatory
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • removeEntitlements

        public static void removeEntitlements(DAO sql,
                                      boolean hierarchy,
                                      <any> entitlements,
                                      OrgUnitBean orgUnit)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        The method removes the given list of entitlements from the organization unit given. The hierarchy boolean flag is used to specify if the removal of entitlements must also include the children of the organization unit given or not.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        hierarchy - The hierarchy boolean flag is used to specify if the removal of entitlements must also include the children of the organization unit given or not.
        entitlements - list of entitlements to remove
        orgUnit - organization unit filter, mandatory
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • removeResources

        public static void removeResources(DAO sql,
                                   boolean hierarchy,
                                   <any> resources,
                                   OrgUnitBean orgUnit)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        The method removes the given list of resources from the organization unit given. The hierarchy boolean flag is used to specify if the removal of resources must also include the children of the organization unit given or not.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        hierarchy - The hierarchy boolean flag is used to specify if the removal of resources must also include the children of the organization unit given or not.
        resources - list of resource to remove
        orgUnit - organization unit filter, mandatory
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • modifySOD

        public static void modifySOD(DAO sql,
                             boolean hierarchy,
                             boolean enableSOD,
                             OrgUnitBean orgUnit)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        The method modifies the enablement of the SoD check of the organization unit given. The hierarchy boolean flag is used to specify if the modification must also include the hierarchy of children of the organization unit given or not. The enableSOD boolean flag is used to specify if the SoD check must be enabled or not. If it is "true" the organization unit is excluded by the SoD check, else it is included.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        hierarchy - boolean flag used to specify if the modification must also include the hierarchy of children of the organization unit given or not
        enableSOD - boolean flag used to specify if the SoD check must be enabled or not -true: the organization unit is excluded by the SoD check -false: the organization unit is included in the SoD check
        orgUnit - organization unit to modify
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findOuType

        public static <any> findOuType(DAO sql,
                               OUTypeBean ouTypeBean,
                               Paging paging)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the types of organization unit that are censused on the system. It is possible to filter by OuTypeBean.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        ouTypeBean - ouTypeBean filter
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of organization unit types
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findApplication

        public static <any> findApplication(DAO sql,
                                    ApplicationBean application,
                                    OrgUnitBean orgUnit,
                                    Paging paging)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the applications of the entitlements associated to the organization unit given. It is possible to filter by application. If the organization unit given is null, it is used the root organization unit.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        application - application filter
        orgUnit - organization unit filter
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of applications found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findApplication

        public static <any> findApplication(DAO sql,
                                    ApplicationBean application,
                                    EntitlementBean entitlement,
                                    OrgUnitBean orgUnit,
                                    Paging paging)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the applications of the entitlements associated to the organization unit given. It is possible to filter by application and entitlement. If the organization unit given is null, it is used the root organization unit.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        application - application filter
        entitlement - entitlement filter
        orgUnit - organization unit filter
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of applications found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
